snippet: The number of Spanish families facing eviction is mounting at a dizzying pace, and when they can’t move in with relatives, they often take over empty homes, and there are plenty of them.
abstract: Spanish housing advocates say number of families facing eviction is mounting at dizzying pace of hundreds per day, and when they cannot move in with relatives, they often take over empty homes; Spain has no emergency shelter system for families.
lead_paragraph: The number of Spanish families facing eviction is mounting at a dizzying pace, and when they can’t move in with relatives, they often take over empty homes, and there are plenty of them.

headline.seo: Spain Evictions Create an Austerity Homeless Crisis
headline.main: Wave of Evictions Leads to Homeless Crisis in Spain
headline.print_headline: Wave of Evictions Leads to Homeless Crisis in Spain
